casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Juan Foronte MCPHAUL 421PA17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 1, 2018 Amanda S. Zimmer, Assistant Appellate Defender, for McPhaul, Juan Foronte.

Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender.

William P. Hart, Jr., Assistant Attorney General, Kristy M. Newton, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Sara B. Warf, Clinical Assistant Professor of Law.

James B. Gatehouse, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Professor Brandon Garrett, et al.

*857The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th of July 2018 to admit Sharon Katz and Matthew R. Brock Pro Hac Vice:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of August 2018."
